# ChangeLog

## v0.2.7
* Typescript support for config-bean-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3687

## v0.2.6
* Fix: module-config-inc does not detect when bean properties are deleted or reset, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3647

## v0.2.5
* Dependency upgrades per security review

## v0.2.4
* Fixed: setPersist creates a new attribute instead of setting existing one when complex name (base:name) is used, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2799

## v0.2.3
* Fixed: do not block process from existing when watching a configbean folder for changes

## v0.2.2
* Fixed: should propagate changes coming via raptor-config-ebay based on file watch; https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2077

## v0.2.1
* Added clear method, which cleans up all attributes for a given config bean

## 0.2.0
* Added feature to mark a config-bean non-persistent by setting property `persist:false`. All beans are persistent by default. 

## 0.1.34
* Modified type resolution.
* Added timestamp support with support like bean.set('name', 'now') will resolve to valid number timestamp.
* Added fetching changed beans
* Added fetching changed bean properties

## 0.1.33
* Fixed: should normalize invalid configbean.id before using them to lock the file.

## 0.1.32
* Added atomic write to config bean property file
* Updated graceful-fs version to match other module dependencies to dedup
* Updated graceful-fs to 4.x for NPM 3.x

## 0.1.30
* Performance optimizations

## 0.1.29
* Added: config bean should allow adding new property

## 0.1.28
* Fixed: getAttributes call should not merge defaultValue to value in attributes definition.
* Added/enhanced: support for boolean and number type detection when they are passed as strings
